sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_cpszo_spoke.GetCustomerProfileDetails</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GetCustomerProfileDetails</name><script><![CDATA[var GetCustomerProfileDetails = Class.create();
GetCustomerProfileDetails.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
  getDetails: function() {
    var sysId = this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id');
    var gr = new GlideRecord('x_cpszo_customer_profile'); // Replace with actual table name
    if (gr.get(sysId)) {
      return JSON.stringify({
        number: gr.getValue('number') // Replace with actual field name if different
      });
    }
    return JSON.stringify({});
  }
});
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>brijesh.banerjee</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-08 06:12:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>5584c5a287772a90b3fb021a0cbb3506</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetCustomerProfileDetails</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Spoke" source="x_cpszo_spoke">8a196a9187c7e61002fdeac73cbb35b9</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Spoke">8a196a9187c7e61002fdeac73cbb35b9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5584c5a287772a90b3fb021a0cbb3506</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>brijesh.banerjee</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-08 06:12:24</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
